text: 4.15 1 Ko 3.21, 2 Ko 1.3-6, Kol 1.24, 2 Ti 2.10 Tap anɨb okok mɨdupsek chɨnop gek koslam mɨdɨlɨg gɨpun ak, nɨbop nen anɨgɨpun. Anɨgek nɨm, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl God kɨlop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gup. Gɨtep gek amek, kɨli God nop tep agɨlɨg mɨdɨlaknɨŋ, yɨb nop dad adek awl alaŋ aplanɨgel. Anɨb ak tap anɨb okok chɨnop anɨgup.
